resource.name: Little Rock Parks Safety - February 2017 to Date
resource.description: This dataset delineates the hazard identification, risk assessment, elimination or mitigation, and tracking to completion of all identified safety hazards resulting from on-going safety audits and inspections of Little Rock parks from February 2017 to date.

Geographical location of each park property

Each hazard being processed is tracked to completion from cradle to grave

resource.name: Information Technology Department Unscheduled Maintenance with Outage
resource.description: This dataset contains information on the number, duration and impact of unscheduled maintenance to a City system that caused an outage.

resource.name: Traffic Violations By Type 2015
resource.description: This dataset displays the kind/number of citations issued in 2015.

resource.name: Information Technology Internal Network Percent Uptime
resource.description: This dataset tracks the time that City network systems are available for use by City staff without an unplanned outage.

resource.name: Little Rock Police Department Statistics 2016
resource.description: This dataset displays Violent & Property Crimes that have taken place in the City of Little Rock. These are part 1 crimes which are reported to FBI. These numbers are subject to change due to reclassifying. Addressing is not provided on Rapes or associated items for victim privacy.

resource.name: Information Technology Help Desk Tickets Completed
resource.description: This dataset shows the number of Information Technology Help Desk Tickets and hours of work associated with them.

resource.name: Positive Prevention Programs
resource.description: This Dataset contains the list, location and overall details about the Positive Prevention Programs contracted to provide services targeted towards youth ages 6-17 who would benefit from: personalized investment into their inherent talents and abilities; quality programming that addresses the gaps in academic enrichment; development of life skills to prepare them for the future; and increased exposure to career opportunities.

resource.name: Parks Volunteer Program Hours and Savings
resource.description: This dataset displays the various Parks volunteer programs, the hours provided and the cost savings to the City for those hours.

resource.name: Zoo Monthly Admissions by Category
resource.description: Monthly breakdown of zoo admissions by category, including paid admissions, memberships, and group sales.
columns_description: Total admissions year to date

resource.name: Community Violence Reduction Services
resource.description: This Dataset contains the list, location and overall details about the Community Violence and Intervention Programs. These programs are contracted to provide services to communities disproportionately impacted by the Covid-19 public health emergency and the seen increase in criminal activity in Qualified Census Tracts.  Organizations will provide relevant knowledge, skills and abilities in at least one (1) of the following designated areas:  Conflict Resolution/Anger Management, Domestic Violence Prevention/Intervention, Hospital-based Intervention, Prevention of Criminal Activity through Violence Intervention, Life Skills and/or Workforce Readiness, Mental Health and Wellness.

resource.name: Fire Atoms
resource.description: Little Rock Fire Department's Atoms represent the detailed response areas for each of our Fire Districts. Each polygon represents a dispatch code, or "Atom", for a unique dispatch sequence, an ordered list of the nearest patrol districts, used for reference by the Fire Dispatcher.

resource.name: Food Desert Task Force Numbers
resource.description: This dataset displays information from the Food Desert task force questionnaire.
columns_name: How do you access the internet and/or email? (Please check all that apply):
Would you be willing to try an online food-purchasing program?
The distance I need to travel to get the food I need for myself/my family is challenging.
Which is more of an issue to grocery shopping for you and your family?
Do you have concerns about food being delivered to your home?
How do you currently get to the grocery store? (Check all that apply)
How do you rate the quality and value (cost) of the food available at the stores where you most frequently purchase your groceries?
In the past week, how much money have you spent on groceries for your household? (DO NOT count money spent on cigarettes or alcoholic beverages. PLEASE include purchases made with SNAP)
Within the past 12 months, the food you bought just didn’t last and you didn’t have the money to get more?
If yes, what concerns do you have about food being delivered to your home?
Within the past 12 months, you worried that your food would run out before you got the money to buy more?
When you go grocery shopping, how long does it take you, including traveling to the store, shopping, and returning?
How often do you go shopping for the major foods for your household? (DO NOT include times when you buy only a few items)
How do you rate the variety of food available at the store where you most frequently purchase your groceries? (Note: an answer of “very good” means you can get all of the products you want.)
If you do not shop for food online, why not? (Please check all that apply.)
How many times in the past 12 months have you shopped for groceries ONLINE for pick-up or delivery?

resource.name: Rental Registry Properties
resource.description: Quick Export Link If after viewing our Rental Registry, you know of a rental property that needs to be researched by the City, please use this form to report it: https://bit.ly/3mxvLQS This dataset contains the active rental properties registered with the City of Little Rock. The ordinance requires that all rental properties be registered with the City and renewed annually. Registration is required for each residential “dwelling unit” that is owned or managed by an agent along with any commercially rented properties.

resource.name: Police Calls for Service December 2020 to Year to Date
resource.description: This dataset contains Police Calls for Service from December 2020 to Year to Date. The addresses have been generalized to block level and offset to protect the privacy of our residents.  Incidents involving sensitive call types have had the addressing removed. Those include: Assist Medical, Child Abandonment, Child Abuse Report, Death, Harassing Communication, Police - Overdose, Police - Suicide, Rape, Sexual Abuse Report, Terroristic Threatening and Vacation Home Report.  All call data posted is preliminary and therefore, the data may change upon further investigation.
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhood Associations 2021' (2m93-nqiv) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Down Payment Assistant Program
resource.description: This dataset contains a list of the homes that the City has provided down payment assistance for purchase. The City of Little Rock has allocated funds to assist low and moderate income first time homebuyers to purchase owner occupancy residential properties within the city limits. Applicants must be pre-approved by a lender. The program funds are provided by HUD through the HOME Investment Partnership Program.

resource.name: Information Technology Scheduled Maintenance with Outage
resource.description: This dataset tracks Information Technology scheduled maintenance that requires some network systems to be taken off-line.

resource.name: City of Little Rock Employee Salaries
resource.description: This dataset displays the current salaries for City of Little Rock employees. Some employees are hourly. Their pay is reflected as an hourly rate.
columns_name: Annual Salary or Hourly Rate for Part Time

resource.name: City Facilities with Public WiFi
resource.description: This dataset contains the locations of City of Little Rock facilities that have publicly accessible WiFi available.  CLR-guest  User name: guest  Password: LRguest123

resource.name: Minority Owned Business Enterprise
resource.description: This data set provides a list of Minority Owned Business in the City of Little Rock.
resource.attribution: Office of Diversity and Equity Inclusion
columns_name: Business name  Nombre de su negocio:
When was your business formally established?Cuando formalizo su negocio?
Number of full-time employees, including yourself  Número de empleados de tiempo completo, incluido usted mismo:
Business type/industry (choose primary focus)  Industria/Tipo de negocio (seleccione su enfoque principal):
Is your business a minority business enterprise?Es su negocio una empresa minoritaria?
Is your business certified by the State of Arkansas as a Minority-Owned Business Enterprise?Su negocio está certificado por el Estado de Arkansas como una empresa comercial propiedad de minoría?
Business phone number including area code  Número de teléfono del negocio:
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Wards Nov_2021' (r36e-4rwh) the point in column 'physical_address_' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Patrol Districts_Nov_2021' (efe8-9vpd) the point in column 'physical_address_' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhood Associations 2021' (2m93-nqiv) the point in column 'physical_address_' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns_name: Amounts Allotted by Resolutions as of 9/1/2023

Count of Volunteers
Month of Volunteer Hours Provided
Count of Volunteer Hours

resource.name: Business Licenses
resource.description: Quick Export Link This dataset contains the active business licenses registered with the City of Little Rock. Anyone who is operating a business within the City of Little Rock is required to obtain a business license or privilege license. City of Little Rock Rental Housing Registration Program also requires a registered agent, which are also contained in this data set under real estate.
columns_description: Date original business license was filed with City of Little Rock
Name of the business on license
Business owner ethnicity
Contact person or entity for the business
Business address
Description of business classification
Unique identifier for the type of license on file with City of Little Rock (BL - Business, AL - Alcohol, TL - Tobacco)
Internal code used by City of Little Rock Treasury Division
Geocoded address of the business
Description of business category
Business owner gender

resource.name: Little Rock

resource.name: Little Rock Police Department Facilities
resource.description: This dataset lists the locations of the Little Rock Police Stations.

resource.name: Little Rock Police Department Statistics 2015
resource.description: This dataset displays Violent & Property Crimes that have taken place in the City of Little Rock. These are part 1 crimes which are reported to FBI. These numbers are subject to change due to reclassifying. Addressing is not provided on Rapes or associated items for victim privacy.
